description:
Pssst… these socks are so low-cut, you can wear them with ballet flats.

  • Ultra lightweight with no cushioning to smoothly glide into close-fitting shoes without bunching
  • Internal grippers at the heels so they stay put
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
  • Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet
  • Includes 2 pairs of socks
name: Smartwool Everyday Secret Sleuth No Show Socks 2-Pack - Women's
